**EchoScopeâ„¢** is a web-based visual analytics prototype built for the ISSS608 Visual Analytics course project. It uses VAST 2025 Mini-Challenge 1 data to explore the artistic evolution of Sailor Shift and the influence of Oceanus Folk on global music.
